articles.description: Vedanta Resources has $1 billion 13.875% bonds due in January 2024, $1bn 6.125% bonds due in August 2024 and $1.2bn 8.95% bonds due in March 2025. At a bondholders meeting organized by Standard Chartered Bank and JP Morgan between September 11 and 15 at Singa…
articles.content: Vedanta Ltd board will meet on September 21 to consider raising non-convertible debentures, the company informed the stock exchange without giving any additional details. The company has two separate… [+2126 chars]
